Subject: Dudas de Gestion
Description:
Excelente día,  recién realice la migración del servidor a una  nueva instancia, y quiero desplegarlo en toda la organización sin embargo tengo algunas dudas respecto al funcionamiento de este modulo. 
Espero pueda contar con su pronta ayuda. 
Saludos
What_We_Know__c:
As we spoke we checked the EPP server and the settings were okay there. Groups imported, but not users or computers.

Recommended following steps:
Settings: https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/EndpointProtector_5.9.4/page/Content/EndpointProtector/Admin/DirectoryServices/Overview.htm
API Permission - where it is: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/entra/identity-platform/quickstart-configure-app-access-web-apis
Next_Steps__c: Waiting on customer to try / double check steps provided.
Solution_Comment__c: Customer is testing. Said we can close the ticket and he will get back to us in case any issues occur.
